intro: Schismatoglottis diversicolor, commonly known as the rainbow haworthia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae and is characterized by its compact, rosette-forming leaves that are often adorned with intricate patterns. The plant produces small, white or greenish flowers that bloom from the base of the rosette. It is a low-maintenance plant that thrives in well-draining soil and bright, indirect light. Schismatoglottis diversicolor is popular among succulent enthusiasts for its unique appearance and ease of care.
